Text.Page: Gah! Those smoldering molochs keep killing my prospectors. We sneak in, hoping to find some fyrdras ore, only to watch those damned molochs pop out of the ground.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"I'll deal with the molochs."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

That'd be fantastic. Even killing one would make a difference for us.

And if you come across a huge fyrdras vein, let me know. It'll be our secret.

Good job. Now we can gather more ore, make more weapons, and kill more argons!

You have my thanks, .
